alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Kimball (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 4:12PM CDT until August 04 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Cheyenne County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... East central Kimball County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 345 PM MDT. * At 312 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Potter, or 16 miles west of Sidney, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Potter, Lorenzo and Brownson. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 35 and 56. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
